title: Problem with Ranked MM
body:
Why are new ranked players placed in mid silver when they have lost all the provisional games thus far?.  It is actually beyond a joke, I've lost quite a large amount of  LP due to these 'new' players. I propose that these players should be assumed mid bronze and work their way up the ladder rather than being placed mid ladder to see whether they stick. 

Rito pls fix

replies.body: I THNK PUT MOR CHAPIONS IN DA GAME, MOR CHAMPION MOR FUN
1600-1800 elo is fucked. Then you wonder why this regions skill level is at the bottom, compared to all the other regions.
